name: Legend of Serigel
description:
Legend of Serigel is a short adventure/story game where you explore the strange island of Serigel and uncover the even stranger mystery it holds, a once thriving village now gone.

WASD - Movement

Space - Interact

Made in 72 hours for Drug Jam #1.

Dev Note: I didn't have nearly as much time as I would have liked to work on this over the weekend, but I still ended up getting something out there and learned a bunch about how to make a game world seem a little more like a world.

Game by Divitos
